fields.summary: Android: Add Indeterminate View back to ProgressBar

comments.body:
On the iOS side, ActivityIndicator is a view that can be used anywhere, and there is no pre-built indicator that blocks UI, like ActivityIndicator does on Android. This means the usage of ActivityIndicator is very different on both platforms.

Perhaps there should be a blocking ProgressDialog on both platforms, with ActivityIndicator used as a indeterminate progress view and ProgressBar as a determinate progress view? This would break some things in the short term, but bring the programming model into closer alignment.
Closing due to inactivity. If this issue still exists, please raise a new ticket.
